entry.source: I want {F804,5}{F872,1},{F804,0} which is known to provide{F801}divine protection from death. The Reaper{F801}{F804,5}Orcus{F804,0} is extremely difficult to find, but{F801}you might get lucky searching in Minami Senju,{F801}{F804,5}north of Ueno.{F804,0} I want to use that material to{F801}make {F804,5}new leg armor{F804,0} so I can put it on sale.{F801}
